#include <stdio.h>

int main()
{
    int T,N,z,A,B,res;
    for (scanf("%u",&T);T>0;T--) {
        int bits[]={0,0};
        scanf("%u %u %u",&N,&A,&B);
        for (res=(1<<N)-1;N>0;N--) {
            bits[0]+=A%2;A>>=1;
            bits[1]+=1-B%2;B>>=1;
        }
        z=bits[0]>bits[1]?bits[0]-bits[1]:bits[1]-bits[0];
        for (;z>0;z--)
            res=res-(1<<(z-1));
        printf("%u\n",res);
    }
}
